questions.text: Calculate the force exerted by a 5 kg object accelerating at 2 m/s². Use Newton's second law of motion.
What is the derivative of the function f(x) = 3x² + 2x + 1 with respect to x?
Explain the working principle of a transformer and its applications in electrical engineering.
A car travels 150 km in 3 hours. Calculate its average speed in km/h.
Describe the process of binary search and its time complexity.
What are the key differences between a linked list and an array in terms of memory allocation and access time?
Solve the quadratic equation x² - 4x + 4 = 0 and find the roots.
Explain the concept of object-oriented programming and its four main principles.
What is the significance of the Reynolds number in fluid mechanics?
Calculate the area of a circle with a radius of 7 cm. Use the formula A = πr².
Describe the differences between synchronous and asynchronous communication in computer networks.
